Reviews.Title: It's Okay....
Reviews.Author: Cheapskate
Reviews.Content: It is hard to get a good picture using this camera. The pictures keep coming out blurry or either uncolored. If I had to buy this again, I would not do it. But, it is cheap so I guess  I cannot complain. If you need a little portable camera to take pictures with sometimes, I guess this would be okay. That's what I aim to use it for!

Reviews.Title: Works but...
Reviews.Author: Brad Porter
Reviews.Content: The pictures this camera takes is of poor quality. Only one of the software downloaded worked okay. The video mode worked, but I will have to try to get the other modes to work again.

Reviews.Title: Not what i thought
Reviews.Author: Mexican money
Reviews.Content: I got here quick. Opened it and it was pink so instantly hated it .im going to leave it sealed so cant say nothing about its function. Planning to sell it to girl

ProductInfo.Features:
Still Camera
Video Camera (mini clips)
Web Camera
ProductInfo.Name: Shift3 Multi-function 3-in-1 Usb Mini Digital Camera with Keyring (VARIOUS COLORS)
